official_title: Resolved, that the following-named Members be, and are hereby elected members of the Committee on Veterans' Affairs:  Carlos J. Moorhead of California, and Tennyson Guyer of Ohio.

summary.text: Provides for the election of Carlos J. Moorhead of California and Tennyson Guyer of Ohio to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: Resolved, that the following-named Members be, and are hereby elected members of the Committee on Veterans' Affairs:  Carlos J. Moorhead of California, and Tennyson Guyer of Ohio.
